SMW Subobject for Before questNPC location: ZanarisUses infobox: NPCNPC ID: 7332Examine: Fairy ring maintenance division.Release date: 11 July 2006Image: File:Fairy Fixit.pngIs members only: trueIs variant of: Fairy Fixit

Fairy Fixit is the only known fairy builder in RuneScape and is probably very experienced in Construction. Players may find her wandering around the main fairy ring in Zanaris. She probably maintains the whole fairy ring teleportation system, as there are no other fairy builders found in Gielinor.

She owns a shop called Fairy Fixit's Fairy Enchantment, which can only be accessed after completion of Fairytale II - Cure a Queen.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
25 August 2016
(update)

The "Trade" option was added, allowing players to purchase a Fairy enchantment after Fairytale II - Cure a Queen.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • If you ask her why she is carrying a toolbox, she proceeds to talk about "fizgogs" and "whosprangits."
